tjc.model

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • tjc.model.Randomiser
      • tjc.model.World

  • public class World
extends Randomiser
    The world of the model, stores the list of agents the setup and tick variables and the tick managers. Calls the managers to iterate over ticks.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World(int seed)
      Constructor, sets the seed for the model, initialises the agent list and power split

      • createAgents

        public void createAgents(int count)
        Creates a number of agents equal to the count argument providing them each with an initialMoney amount of money. This money will then be updated based on the holdings of the agent
        Parameters:
        count - The number of agents to create

      • tick

        public int tick()
        Iterates over a tick, calling the relevant tick manager for the current model
        Returns:
        The tick that has been completed

      • start

        public void start()
        Builds the world using either the values input by the user or the default presets. Loops through as many ticks as have been set
